overview:
Joe Levy is the VP of Partner Marketing at Ground Truth.

Prior to his role at Ground Truth, Joe was director, carrier accounts at Ontela, a provider of imaging services for mobile operators, where he was responsible for advising mobile operatorsâ€™ efforts to drive consumer adoption of Ontelaâ€™s mobile imaging infrastructure.

Joe came to Ontela from Qpass, a market-leading digital commerce infrastructure company. As director of marketing, Joe developed Qpassâ€™s corporate positioning, messaging strategies and collateral materials to support sales to mobile operators.

Previously, Joe was a senior marketing manager at Microsoft, where he worked in the Windows Mobile division. In that capacity, Joe created innovative product marketing strategies, including a successful sales enablement program. He also held various roles at Icarian and Accenture.

Joe holds an M.B.A. from Northwestern Universityâ€™s Kellogg School of Management and a bachelorâ€™s degree in civil engineering from Washington University (St. Louis).
